item.title: Combinatorial Optimization using Analog Computing
item.description:
• Studying the noise robustness of analog optimization methods for NP-Hard problems.
  • More details to be updated soon!

item.title: Neurosymbolic Multi-hop Reasoning
item.description:
• Building a logical Natural Language Inference dataset with verifiable proof steps using neuro-symbolic approach.
  • We believe this would help build more reliable and interpretable systems, critical in real-world settings.
  • Dataset to be released soon.

item.title: Combinatorial Optimisation on DWAVE systems
item.description:
• Verified the use of DWAVE to achieve a speedup in Machine Learning and combinatorial optimization problems.
  • Worked on optimization of various problems - Feature Selection, Quantum Boosting, Restricted Boltzmann Machine, Map Coloring, Satisfiability problem and others using quantum annealing on NASA’s DWAVE computer.
  • Please refer the pdf for some of my notes.

item.title: Quantum Techniques for Stochastic Mechanics
item.description:
• Investigated overlap and parallels between quantum mechanics and stochastic mechanics.
  • Study based on work by John C. Baez, Jacob Biamonte
  • Please refer the pdf for the notes!

item.title: Secure Quantum Computation
item.description:
• A study based project inspecting quantum protocols which provide fully private assisted quantum computation.
  • Please refer the pdf for the notes!

item.title: Synthesis of Quantum Dots
item.description:
• Synthesized fluorescent quantum Dots
  • Please refer the pdf for the experimentation details.

item.title: Quantum Circuit Design
item.description:
• Designed efficient quantum circuits for discrete time topological quantum walks for near term quantum computers.
  • Details to be updated soon!
